Package nexbot.task

Class TaskList

java.lang.Object
nexbot.task.TaskList
public class TaskList extends Object
Represents a collection of Task objects.

Provides 1-based access to tasks as displayed to the user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TaskList()
    Constructs an empty TaskList.
    TaskList(ArrayList<Task> tasks)
    Constructs a TaskList using an existing list of tasks.

  • Constructor Details

    • TaskList

      public TaskList()
      Constructs an empty TaskList.

    • TaskList

      public TaskList(ArrayList<Task> tasks)
      Constructs a TaskList using an existing list of tasks.
      Parameters:
      tasks - List of tasks to initialise with. If null, an empty list is created.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(Task task)
      Adds a task to the list.
      Parameters:
      task - Task to be added.

    • get

      public Task get(int taskNumber) throws InvalidTaskNumberException
      Returns the task corresponding to the given 1-based task number.
      Parameters:
      taskNumber - 1-based task number shown to the user.
      Returns:
      The task at the specified position.
      Throws:
      InvalidTaskNumberException - If the task number is out of range.

    • remove

      public Task remove(int taskNumber) throws InvalidTaskNumberException
      Removes and returns the task corresponding to the given 1-based task number.
      Parameters:
      taskNumber - 1-based task number shown to the user.
      Returns:
      The removed task.
      Throws:
      InvalidTaskNumberException - If the task number is out of range.

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of tasks in the list.
      Returns:
      Total number of tasks.

    • getTasks

      public ArrayList<Task> getTasks()
      Returns the underlying list of tasks.
      Returns:
      The list of tasks.
